text: Mortimer Edward Hogan (1862–1923) was an outfielder in Major League Baseball. He started his professional career in 1883 with the Peoria Reds. He played in the Union Association in 1884 and in the American Association in 1887–1888. ==Sources== Category:1862 births Category:1923 deaths Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Milwaukee Brewers (UA) players Category:Cleveland Blues (1887–88) players Category:New York Metropolitans players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Illinois Category:Milwaukee Brewers (minor league) players Category:Peoria Reds players Category:Memphis Reds players Category:Cleveland Forest Cities players Category:Elmira Colonels players Category:Leavenworth Soldiers players Category:Augusta Browns players Category:Atlanta Atlantas players Category:Nashville Blues players
title: Mortimer Hogan
